result.arabic_text: وَلَا تَقۡرَبُواْ ٱلزِّنَىٰٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَٰحِشَةٗ وَسَآءَ سَبِيلٗا
result.translation: (32) And do not approach unlawful sexual intercourse.[741] Indeed, it is ever an immorality and is evil as a way.
result.footnotes: [741]- i.e., avoid all situations that might possibly lead to it.
